Introduction: Greetings, human.#$e#We thank you for your willingness to help us.
Mon: It is a mystery how all that shrubbery blocking the lake grew so quickly.
Tue: Salutations, human. Basking in the sunlight today, are we?#$e#I so adore the glimmer of a fish in the natural effulgence of the sun.
Wed: Bonjour, human.#$e#I get the inkling that something akin to a French baguette is near...
Thu: Regards, human. I found an inquisitive device in the forest quite recently.#$e#It was filled with lovely scripture that I have grown quite fond of.
Fri: Good day, human.#$e#That is all I have for today.
Sat: Bonjour, human.#$e#I get the inkling that something akin to a French baguette is near...
Sun: Salutations, human. Basking in the sunlight today, are we?#$e#I so adore the glimmer of a fish in the natural effulgence of the sun.
